name: The 2nd Floor
review description: We had a terrific Mother's Day Brunch. Three-Course Menu was unique with just enough of a variety for everyone (i.e., kids) to find something they liked. Portions were not too large but not too small either. Wine pairings were a nice touch. Highly recommend The 2nd Floor.

name: Abacus
review description: Very pleased with our visit. Outstanding service and great food.

name: Afghan Grill
review description: Our third visit to Afghan Grill. The appetizer Sampler was a very generous portion for 4 people, and serves as a wonderful introduction to the menu. Also highly recommend the Aush, a hearty, highly flavorful soup. Personal service that was right on the money.

name: Al Biernats
review description: Al's always pleases. Sunday night is an off night and doesn't have the buzz of a Thursday, Friday or Saturday - but the food was excellent. Service was just a little off.

name: Arcodoro & Pomodoro - Dallas
review description: This was our first visit to Arcodoro and Pomodora--and we will be back! Not only were the food and service wonderful--but the presentation of the food was beautiful! We could not have been more pleased!

name: Artin's Grill
address: 5840 Legacy Circle Suite D100 Plano, TX  75024
review description: went for a friend's birthday and ordered different dishes to sample and all were delicious. It was a shame we couldnt sample all. The bread pudding was to die for.

name: Asador
review description: Best porkchop I've ever had. The grilled peaches in the pork jus was amazing as well. Solid selection of beers as well. Will definitely go back again!

name: Asian Mint
address: 11617 N. Central Expressway Ste 135 Dallas, TX  75243
review description: This was out first experience at Asian Mint. We had a 7:30 dinner reservation on a Sunday night but weren't seated until close to 8 PM although the entire party arrived by 7:35. There was a party of 20 sitting near us which seemed to slow things down, and the wait staff seemed disorganized. We didn't eat until about 8:45. It's small and crowded - to the point where glasses and dishes were being knocked off other tables by accident and breaking. The food was very good except for their signature dessert (green tea cake) which was bland and tasteless. Half-off wine night was a bonus and the wine was very good. Recommended but not enthusiastically.

name: Avanti Ristorante
review description: We loved everything about Avanti. We had not been there in a few years and had forgotten how good it is.

name: Baboush
review description: Fantastic! Loved food and atmosphere. The live music was great. Will go back and enjoy a houka next time. Go check this place out! We'll be back.

name: Bailey's Prime Plus - Fairview
review description: Bailey's Prime in Fairview is always a treat. Excellent food, Bone-in Dry Aged Strip cooked perfectly. Service is always excellent, very attentive without disrupting the evening. Great wine list and they always have the bottle I select, never a dissapointment. Highly recommended.

name: Bailey's Prime Plus - Park Lane
address: 8160 Park Lane Suite CX130 Dallas, TX  75231
review description: Great food and great service. The ambiance and atmosphere is what you would expect at a high-end steakhouse, very classy. This would be a great restaurant for a romantic night out.

name: Benihana - Dallas
review description: You get what you pay for. There were quite a few noisy kids in the place. The staff put on a decent show for a moderate price. That being said the food was bland but the service was very attentive. My wife’s teriyaki beef was the most flavorful food at the table. We fine dine a lot so the bar is pretty high..I would go back but just don't expect a 4 or 5 star meal here..The Chef puts on a fairly good show for the younger kids at the table but the timing of the food coming off the grill is a bit disjointed..I had the Chateau and Lobster. It was just OK for the 45.00 price tag. Foodwise, my 3 star rating in restaurant terms is pretty generous here.

name: Benihana - Las Colinas
review description: Our chef, Fernando, was very courteous and had a difficult task as we ordered multiple types of fried rice within the group. However, the scallops and shrimp were slightly over-cooked and the hibachi chicken dishes needed salt as he did not salt them at all. All in all, it was good food, good service and great ambiance. We had a small team outing and it was quite enjoyable. We normally request Chef Luis Gutierrez but he was not working. His food is always spot on and we will definitely return but verify that he is working before we make our reservations. I would guess that Fernando just needs a bit more experience.

name: Benihana - Plano
address: 5840 Legacy Circle Suite D130 Plano, TX  75024
review description: really good food, service, and cooks!

name: Bijoux
review description: We really liked having the choice of a half size entrees. The portions were not overwhelming, for a nice change. The food was excellent. The wine list was a little pricy.

name: Bijoux - The Chef’s Room
review description: Outstanding food and great service. The Chef's Room only has 6 or so tables, only half of which were occupied during our dinner. The Chef's menu offers a standard 5- or 6-course option or a 5-course vegetarian option. My wife and I opted for the standard menu with wine pairings, and after that the fun began. The service was spot-on, the sommelier was incredibly friendly and helpful, and we thoroughly enjoyed our dinner. Will definitely be back again, and not just for a special occasion.

name: Birra Poretti's - Arlington
review description: Nothing exceptional. Nice and attentive staff but the place is just so-so. Food was OK but not enough to go back.

name: Bistro N
address: 8687 North Central Expressway Suite 2000 Dallas, TX  75225
review description: Service and food very good; too noisy to have conversation.

name: The Blue Fish - Allen
review description: My family went to Blue Fish for a celebration. The food and plating was excellent. However, the plates they served it on were way too large for the table. We were shuffling plates, drinks, etc. all evening. While the place is popular, the music (techno style) was way too loud; it was hard to carry on a conversation. I would recommend if you go to enjoy your company, eat outside on their patio.

name: The Blue Fish Japanese Restaurant - Las Colinas
address: 925 W John Carpenter Fwy Irving, TX  75039
review description: Eaten there a few times over the last month. Definitely a little on the pricier side given location, but sushi is very good and well prepared

name: The Blue Fish Japanese Restaurant-North Dallas
review description: We used to go to Blue Fish when we would go to Dallas and were first married. This time we took our kids! It was great fun. While the restaurant is really more of an adult hangout, our girls were treated like royalty. They even got a visit from a fabulous magician! There is no official kids menu but the waitress recommended some really yummy chicken meatballs! Be sure to ahve an ahi tower...even yummier than we remembered!

name: The Blue Fish-Greenville Ave
review description: The Lobster Roll was delicious!

name: Bob's Steak & Chop House - Grapevine
review description: Steak was great, dessert (peanut butter brownie) was to die for, Ahi Tuna was fair/good. Service was very good. I'd go again, but will stick to the steaks.DJ

name: Bob's Steak & Chop House - Plano
address: 5760 Legacy Dr. Suite B-1 Plano, TX  75024
review description: A steak house is never my first choice for a special dinner, but with out of town guests, it was there's! Nonetheless, the food was very good. I had a sea bass that was quite good. My husband had a duck that was excellent! I was most impressed with the wait staff that was always present to serve, but very unobtrusive. If I ever need to go somewhere for steak again, Bob's would be my first choice.Ask them to seat you in the back room if you want a quiet dinner. The room upfront was a little more energetic.

name: Bob's Steak & Chop House Dallas on Lamar
address: 555 S. Lamar Located in the Omni Dallas Hotel Dallas, TX  75202
review description: Bob's is by far the best steakhouse and the location on Lamar in the Omni is brand new and very unique

name: Bob's Steak and Chop House - Dallas on Lemmon Avenue
review description: Excellent experience overall. Perfectly cooked and flavorful filet, amazing creamed spinach and to-die-for key lime pie.

name: Bob's Steak and Chop House - Fort Worth
review description: Food is great and atmosphere is as well...

name: Boi Na Braza - Dallas
review description: Great food, must try the specialty of the house!

name: Bonnell's Fine Texas Cuisine
address: 4259 Bryant Irvin Rd. Fort Worth, TX  76109
review description: As always, a spectacular experience. Without question the best restaurant in Texas, if not the entire country. Chef Bonnell and his staff make everything perfect.

name: Bonnie Ruth's Cafe et Patisserie
review description: We went on a Wednesday night for Ladies night. Great time and the food was wonderful!

name: Braza Dancante
address: 190 E. Stacy Rd Ste 1000 Allen, TX  75002
review description: It was a slow night for the restaurant and for the people eating there. Most of the time at Brazilian steakhouses you never run short on food. This night, it was not uncommon for the entire table to have empty plates as we waited for them to bring out any meat.

name: Brownstone
review description: We met another couple for dinner and wanted a quite place to sit and talk. We stayed for several hours and never felt like they were trying to turn tables. I had the tenderloin and grits and it was great.

name: Buca di Beppo - Frisco
review description: If you walk away hungry you aren't doing it right! Huge portions and family style meals make this a great spot for big groups or even for two people who want to share a dish. Wide range of menu items so there is something for everyone.

name: Buca di Beppo - Park Lane
review description: We were celebrating our 48th wedding anniversary with friends and had a tremendously great time. Our waiter could not have been more gracious and accommodating. The food was great. Thanks for making it a great evening for us.

name: Buca di Beppo - Southlake
review description: The minute I pulled out the coupon that I was sent in the email by BDB as a member of their "club," our waiter put on a sour face and began flinging dishes around, ignoring us, being curt, etc. Unfortunately, this poor service affected the entire experience, so I have to rate the experience as so-so and we e decided not to return tot his lcation, as much as we like Buca Di Beppo.

name: The Butcher Shop Steakhouse
review description: The chef overcooked my steak at first, but the new one was brought out quickly. They even gave us a free desert to make up for it. Excellent service.

name: Buttons Food and Music-Addison
review description: I really liked everything there. The food is awesome, drinks are good and the band was hot. My only complaint is that we were asked to leave as they had another reservation for our table right as the band began to play. We were still ready to buy more drinks and listen to the band. We got there at 7:30 and the band didn't get on stage until 9 pm. With it being a Friday night there was no where to sit at the bar so we left. Which was unfortunate as we really wanted to stay hear the band and have a few more drinks. I will definitely recommend it and will be going back. I will just make sure to make a later reservation so that we can enjoy the band more.

name: Buttons Food and Music-Fort Worth
review description: My GG's and I were there to celebrate a birthday and we thorughly enjoyed Buttons. I used OpenTable to make the reservations and we were seated as soon as we arrived. The food was "EXCELLENT"! And our waitress, who was new was very nice and attentive. The music was an added pleasant bonus. Our overall experience was wonderful! Thanks for being part of our special girls night out! We will definitley be returning.

name: Cacharel Restaurant
address: 2221 East Lamar Blvd 9th Floor Arlington, TX  76006
review description: As always, the food and service were excellent.

name: Cadot Restaurant
review description: This was our second visit, and it was just as good as the first. It's a casual, but very earnest place. My brother is becoming addicted to the cassoulet. If I lived in the area I would probably eat here weekly.

name: Café Greek Dallas
review description: The food is fantastic but the service was very slow or maybe just culturally relevant!Don't go if you are in a hurry!The atmosphere is more cafe style and outdated, could use a good sprucing up...BUT, again, the food was wonderful!

name: Cafe Malaga
review description: This place is not horrible, but it’s just not good either. Service and food is mediocre at best. Ordered 10 different tapas, 9 of which were forgettable. Only bright spot on menu was the lamb chops. Ended with crème brulee for dessert that was inedible – literally all three of us has one spoonful and couldn’t eat more. I could not recommend this restaurant to a friend. Try the tapas-style small plates at Cavalli’s, which is much better.

name: Cafe Modern
review description: This is my second visit to the Cafe Modern, the staff was attentive, the food was excellent and the environment was eyecatching, wighe the pebbled water garden as the backdrop. My guest was thoroughly pleased as well I.

name: Cafe on the Green at the Four Seasons Dallas
review description: they were exceptional @ offering off menu items..wanted bread pudding but wasn't on the desert menu...not only did they get us the bread pudding..but it was fantastic!!

name: Cafe Pacific
review description: I have eaten at Cafe Pacif several times and I am never disappointed. The food, service and environment are great!

name: CampO Modern Country Bistro
review description: The food was fantastic but I can't honestly say I'd ever go back. The service detracted from the great food so badly that my wife and I decided to go elsewhere for dessert and drinks just to get out of the bad mood that dinner at Campo had put us in.

name: Cantina Texas
review description: Buffalo burger was boring. French frys were kind if tasteless. Ordered grilled veggies w kids meals aThey were butter sautéed squash. Mist kids hate squash. Green beans, brocolli, even peas and carrots would have been better for them.Server was great!!!

name: Capital Grille – Dallas – Plano
review description: Initial dining experience was so poor we decided not to return, however, on a subsequent visit, service and food was wonderful. However, Saturday night there were six of us celebrating a birthday and the experience was dismal - bad service and the food was subpar. Our initial wine we ordered was not available and the recommended wine did not compare in anyway. We will not return.

name: Capital Grille - Dallas - Uptown
review description: We had wonderful food and excellent service Capital Grille never disappoints!!!! We were headed to the theater and we ordered off of the "Performing Arts" menu and it was perfect for the evening

name: Capital Grille - Fort Worth
review description: The staff was attentive and made everyone in the group feel special.

name: Cast Iron at the Omni Fort Worth
review description: The service was excellent. It is a romantic setting from the viewpoint of cozy booths and reduced lighting, however the openings to the lobby detract from that. The food was good. Solid and tasty but nothing special with the exception of the salad which was superb. The free valet parking is a very nice touch and the people watching is tons of fun. I would definitely go there again and think it is a good spot to take out of town guests as well.

name: The Cedars Social
review description: It's the Meddlesome Moth for more of a hipster crowd. Keeps getting better as it matures.

name: Central 214 - Hotel Palomar Dallas
review description: Great food. The friends we came with had never had a Scotch Egg before (and they are well traveled) and they loved it. The fries are "to die for". Crispy on the outside and liked mashed potato on the inside. If this restaurant was closer to home, I would be there more often and be gaining weight. Loved the corn bread with avocado, What an interesting combination. The green tomato pie is amazing - so different from the usual over sugared desserts you normally get.

name: Chamberlain's Fish Market Grill
review description: Chamberlain's Fish Market Grill is a great value. I think it is one of the very best restaurants for the money in DFW. Very good atmosphere, great food and very reasonable prices.

name: Chamberlain's Steak & Chop House
review description: There are so many steakhouses in Dallas, that it's been a while since I have been back to Chamberlain's. I had forgotten how good this restaurant is. The service was outstanding as were all the dishes that we ordered, especially given that it was a busy Saturday night.

name: Charlie Palmer at The Joule
review description: My wife and I enjoyed a wonderful anniversary dinner at Charlie Palmer's. The food was excellent, service was great and the atmosphere was romantic. We definitely plan to dine there again

name: Citrus Bistro Seafood
review description: Excellent food. The chef know what he is doing. Had the steak tartar appetizer (great value for $12) and then the blackened red fish, fabulous. I have rarely eaten such good fish dish. My wife had the lobster bisque and the crab - really good too. Don't forget to bring your own wine. a true neighborhood gem. we went on a Friday night and it was completely packed.

name: cityhouse
review description: Filet was very good. NY strip.....not so much. Waiter had very little experience. Brought check to table without offering desert menu.

name: The Classic Cafe
review description: We had an excellent dining experience. Great food and wine and excellent service.

name: Clay Pit - Addison
review description: Naan was the best part of our meal...

name: Cool River Cafe - Dallas
review description: Totally UNACCEPTABLE - THIS PLACE IS A SMOKING ESTABLISHMET

name: Copelands of New Orleans
review description: Everything was excellent. Server was very good. Really enjoyed the dining experience.

name: Craft Dallas
review description: As always, Craft Dallas provided a perfect dining experience. My wife and I come to Craft a few times a year and the quality is always perfect and the atmosphere excellent.

name: Crossroads at House of Blues - Dallas
review description: Great place for a show. Food was average at best.

name: Culpepper Steak House
review description: I HAVE NOT BEEN TO CULPEPPER'S IN PROBABLY SEVEN YEARS AND I WOULD PUT THE OVER ALL EXPERIENCE IN EVEN IN THE CONTEST WITH THE CAPITAL GRILL, ANY WHERE!MANY THINKS,

name: Dakota's Steakhouse
review description: I took my girlfriend here on the night I purposes and it was the perfect choice. We had the Atlantic salmon and Mac & cheese with truffles. The salmon was golden on the outside and fell apart on the inside. The Mac & cheese was some of the best we've had as well. We highly recommend Dakota's and we will return.

name: Dallas Chop House
review description: The food was good and the service was good...just one exception. We had bought the AT&T performance package. When our entree's was served, it was only asteak with a clove of roasted garlic on the plate. We were not servedthe potatoes and mushrooms that was suppose to accompany that. I should have questioned the waiter, but didn't. I don't really understand how a mistake like that could happen.I was so sure later that we were suppose to get a side dish I checked it out on the webthe next day.

name: Dallas Fish Market
review description: Our food was delicious as always, very creatively prepared! We enjoyed the deftly done additions to our meal.

name: Del Frisco's Double Eagle Steak House - Dallas
review description: We truly enjoyed our dining experience the food was wonderful, service was great. Our server was attentive and offer great suggestions. The pianist was outstanding he performed memorable hits from the 70's and 80's.

name: Del Frisco's Double Eagle Steakhouse - Ft. Worth
review description: I've always wanted to eat At Del Friscos. We were celebrating our 37th Anniversary, As I was looking for a restaurant to eat in downtown Fort Worth as soon as I saw Del Frisco, my search was over. The food was delicious, the atmosphere romantic, and the service was wonderful. I will definitely return over and over again.

name: Del Frisco's Grille - McKinney Ave - Dallas
review description: Only downfall was the $50 special steak dinner does not come with any sides... for $50 bucks ... a few veggies would have be appropriate.

name: DISH - Dallas
address: 4123 Cedar Springs Road Suite 110 Dallas, TX  75219
review description: Always enjoy dining at Dish. Friendly service, great food and lovely modern interior. The ribeye I had was wonderful.

name: Draft Picks
review description: Great place to watch a game. Drinks are somewhat expensive but service is good.

name: Dragonfly at Hotel ZaZa
review description: We really enjoyed ourselves! Everything was absolutely fabulous, we definitely will be going back again soon!

name: Dream Cafe
review description: Our large group of 12 went to DREAM CAFE for a pre-theatre dinner. Everyone raved about the unique menu and delicious food. The server was friendly, accommodating, and efficient. It was a great experience...one we would repeat!

name: Eddie V's - Fort Worth
review description: I am from New England and the seafood was exceptional. This is very hard to find here in Texas. They made an extra effort to ensure our Anniversary was noted during our meal there. I will definitely be coming back.

name: Eddie V's Dallas
address: 4023 Oak Lawn Ave Suite 110 Suite 11o Dallas, TX  75219
review description: The food and service were outstanding. Don't miss this gem!

name: Edo Japan
review description: The food is very, very good. Most of the wait staff, except for one, isnt quite up to the task unfortunately. Knowing that going in, we still eat there at least twice a week. Lunch and dinner equally high quality. My wife gets sushi and the avocado salad, I the hibachi filet mignon (which you can get a a non-hibachi table). There's not enough parking, but there is now free valet on the weekends. We are going this afternoon with the whole family for Mother's Day. Can't wait!

name: Edoko Sushi
review description: This is my favorite sushi place!

name: El Ranchito
review description: Food was just great! We were with other friends and they also like it.

name: Ellerbe Fine Foods
address: 1501 W. Magnolia Ave Fort Worth, TX  76104
review description: GREAT Fort Worth find. Actually DO the local/seasonal thing!!! I. Am a Foodie. I am going back soon.

name: Ellie's Mexican Restaurant and Cantina
review description: Beef fajitas were awesome and the margarita was good. Patio was a little cramped, queso wasn't great, but pretty good little restaurant.

name: Fearing's
address: The Ritz-Carlton, Dallas 2121 McKinney Avenue Dallas, TX  75201
review description: As always, great food and great service. Hard to beat this place on both accounts.

name: Fedora Restaurant
review description: While pictures may be worth a thousand words (the pics on their site gave a good impression), but don't expect too much out of this place. The food was adequate; not great. The wait-staff performed like rejects from other finer establishments. As we went through our meal, we had to ask for our dishes to be taken way although pushed to the table perimeter (not hint enough). A dinner cocktail one person ordered was not made correctly, and instead of the bartender remaking the drink properly, the wait person took the drink back to the kitchen and "acted" as though she remade it -- it was not; we we were able to see her walk to the back and noticed what she did (or rather didn't do). Basically: All show, no substance and substandard quality.

name: Ferrari's Italian Villa
review description: It was a nother great night at Ferrari's!! Thanks again to our favorite server Austin from Boston.

name: Ferre Fort Worth
review description: Again a great time at Ferre. My first time sitting in the bar area. They had a great feature on Rahr beer. I spoke to the representative from Rahr Brewery about their beers. I sampled 3 different beers and enjoyed the pizza & bruschetta. Also, a partner in the Ferre restaurant came around to make everyone feel welcome. Fun night!!

name: Five Sixty by Wolfgang Puck
review description: I thought the food was good (not excellent) and a bit expensive. We had 4 adults and 1 child, with only 2 people drinking wine and our tab was $400! Also, not kid friendly. No kid menus. While I don't want a kid menu with chicken finger or mac n' cheese, a child size portion of something would have been nice. Grilled chicken with a vegetable or a pasta dish. I ordered the roast chicken for my 7 year old and she ate 2 bites of a $25 dish. YIkes!

name: Four Winds Steakhouse
review description: Great steakhouse in the woods. Great to unwind with a glass of wine on the porch with old friends.

name: The French Room
address: The Adolphus Hotel 1321 Commerce St. Dallas, TX  75202
review description: 5 star service and excellent food! We will be going back to this restaurant on our next trip to Dallas.

name: Gordon Biersch Brewery Restaurant - Park Lane
review description: Extremely noisy and busy with large parties. Fair service and fair food. I knew they had a vegetarian menu but it was never offered. I had to ask for it.

name: Gordon Biersch Brewery Restaurant - Plano
address: 7401 Lone Star Drive, Suite B120 Plano, TX  75024
review description: We love the beer and the burgers, great atmisphere

name: Grace - Fort Worth
review description: Great restaurant, great food, great service. We moved it to our favorites list for sure and will be back soon.

name: Grand Met
address: 2337 South International Parkway at DFW Airport, Terminal D Dallas, TX  75261
review description: I was there w/ my two kids. We wanted to catch the 7th game of the NBA Eastern Conference Finals. They went out of the way to accommodate us - set up a place in the lounge area - so that the kids can watch the game as we ate. Food was great and the service was excellent. Very attentive and always helpful. My kids loved the restaurant.

name: The Grape
review description: Was a wonderful little gem of a restaurant!

name: Greek Isles Grille
address: 3309 N. Central Expwy. Ste. 370 Plano, TX  75023
review description: If you are looking for a casual, unpretentious restaurant that is focused on the quality and flavors of its dishes, look no further. This family-owned restaurant has been a staple of the DFW area for 18 years - not an easy feat in Dallas! We have been going to the Greek Isles for years and have never been disappointed.

name: The Grill on the Alley - Dallas
review description: Had a business lunch at The Grill. It was perfect, great atmosphere, energetic, good food, although I have had better salmon caesar salads,friendly service. I would recommend The Grill to anyone looking for something different that is classy and a sure bet.

name: H3 Ranch at the Stockyards Hotel
address: 109 East Exchange Ave. Fort Worth, TX  76164
review description: This was a working lunch and was perfect for that purpose. There are out of the way tables and the service is top notch. As usual, the food was terrific.

name: Hannah's off The Square
review description: We had a great experience with the exception of the waiter. Alan seemed to be a little short with us and seemed to be a little full of himself.

name: Hibashi Teppan Grill, Sushi Bar
review description: I can't say enough great things about Hibashi. We have tried all of the other teppan tables in the area and this by far exceeds its competitors. They recently went through some staffing changes and things are drastically better. It is very obvious that management is finally focusing on service.....as their food has always been fabulous.

name: Hibiscus
review description: I love Hibiscus, The food is amazing and the service is always wonderful and accommodating. This is the second time I've had Herman as my waiter and he is always on point and very knowledgeable about the food, wine and has great personality. The hostess was also so friendly...I am all about the customer service and Hibiscus is so attentive to their patrons and I always look forward to dining with them, especially for my birthday dinners.

name: Houlihan's Restaurant - Arlington
review description: Great restaurant with amazing menu! The almond crusted tilapia is fantastic!

name: Houlihan's Restaurant - Dallas
address: 5225 Belt Line Road Suite 220 Dallas, TX  75254
review description: We love Houlihan's. Great food and excellent service by Heather. Would love to see some specials for dinner - if only on weekends. Thanks.

name: Houlihan's Restaurant - Garland
review description: Food quality and service were very good!

name: Howard Wang's Uptown China Brasserie
review description: As always, amazing service and food! This has quickly become my favorite Chinese food restaurant in Dallas!!!

name: III Forks - Dallas
review description: The service was good with an attentive waiter and attention to detail. The steaks were over-cooked, mine was suppose to be medium-rare and my wife's medium, and we had to send out appetizer back because it was room temperature.

name: India West Fine Dining & Lounge
review description: This is the best Indian restaurant in Dallas-Ft Worth. The service, ambiance, and food are all top notch. Everything we tried was fantastic. I have nothing but praise for the delicious food. I would describe the restaurant as romantic and intimate. They also have a nice outdoor seating area. On the weekends they have a piano player who plays everything from classical to current pop. She is very good. I really liked this place and can't wait to return.

name: Isabella's Italian Restaurant
address: 1279 Legacy Dr. Suite 100 Frisco / Plano, TX  75034
review description: Excellent food! Service was really good too.

name: J.R.'s Steakhouse
review description: We went to JR's for my husband's birthday. Instead of enjoying the fine dining experience we are use to from JR's, we found it to be just an average restaurant. The server was eager however was inexperienced. The steaks were good but not exceptional. We expected them to be outstanding for $40.00+ a plate. I will say the calamari and deserts were terrific.

name: Jasper's - Plano
address: 7161 Bishop Rd. Suite G-1 Plano, TX  75024
review description: Music was too loud - couldn't talk over it- other than that great service and wonderful food

name: Jaxx Steakhouse
review description: Never dissapointed with the steaks or the sea food; they know what their doing simple as that. Add an old Chicago ambiance you have a winner; that's why Jaxx has been at the same location doing the same thing for so many years.

name: Jinbeh Japanese Restaurant
address: 301 E. Las Colinas Blvd Suite 301 Irving, TX  75039
review description: This was our 2nd visit to Jinbeh and we recommend this restaurant as a great place for sushi and teppanyaki. The chef this visit didn't season the food enough but it was still a great experience...we love that the chefs just cook and don't need to add all the banging of knives or throwing of rice.

name: Jorge's Tex Mex Cafe
review description: busy night before the Jersey Boys but we got our food fast and it was amazing!only issue was our table was crammed into a small section at the large booth area but all in all good.

name: Kenichi - Dallas
review description: Excellent server and very good food. LOVED the Travel Zoo coupon. Would not have driven to Dallas to try the restaurant with out the coupon.

name: Kenny's Italian Kitchen
address: 5100 Belt Line Rd Ste 764 Dallas, TX  75254
review description: Kenny's was great as always! The veal crostinis are a must try! The chicken piccata was wonderful, and of course the usual great service I have come to love from all Kenny's restaurants! Definitely recommend! Also recommend reservations.

name: Kenny's Wood Fired Grill
address: 5000 S Beltline Rd Suite 775 Dallas, TX  75254
review description: Love the whole atmosphere. We have been coming here since it opened. Had just had dinner the night before at Kenny"s Burgers. Food at both restaurants always stellar. I had left my sunglass case on Friday night, called Saturday and picked it up on Saturday afternoon. Everyone was very gracious. Kenny handed me my glasses, asked how our experience was. My response--"too much good wine and too much fun" might have attributed to my forgetfulness. He laughed and said he was pleased about both of my comments!!!

name: Kirby's Prime Steakhouse - Southlake
review description: Between the band and open floor plan it was much louder than expected.

name: Kobe Steaks - Dallas
review description: The food was tender and flavorful, the ambiance good. What happened to the shrimp sauce, though? That was ALWAYS my favorite!

name: Komali Restaurant
review description: The ceviche tasted fishy and was a real disappointment. Two of us ordered the ceviche and we both should have sent it back and ordered something else. The enchiladas, guacamole and black bean soup were good. I had been to Komali two years ago and loved it but this time, the experience fell short.

name: Kona Grill - Dallas
address: 8687 North Central Expressway North Park Center Dallas, TX  75225
review description: As always, an excellent meal, with attentive staff and great food.

name: La Calle Doce
review description: We enjoyed our lunch. Overall the experience was pleasant.

name: La Calle Doce - Lakewood
review description: Fantastic authentic Mexican seafood dishes. Enough kick for true spice fans and enough variety for non foodies. Highly recommend!

name: La Fiorentina
review description: We had heard a lot about this place, but overall were not impressed with any of our food selections. They Osco Bucco was pretty good but the rest of our dishes left something to be desired.

name: Landmark Restaurant - The Warwick Melrose Hotel Dallas
review description: The waiter recommended a great wine and was extremely attentive. The tuna poke was our favorite, but the fois groie fell flat. It was good, but just not great.

name: Lanny's Alta Cocina Mexicana
review description: Very Gormet , food selection excellent and plenty of choices. Presentation and service top notch. On par with the Zaggats best around Country.

name: Lavendou Bistro
review description: As usual, absolutely wonderful. Busier than usual so a little slow on the service but we were busy talking so no problem. This is my goto place for a special dinner.

name: Lawry's The Prime Rib - Dallas
review description: Traditional Prime Rib carved table side. It's outstanding.

name: Lefty's
review description: We had to wait 45 minutes for our table despite having a reservation. It was so loud we had to shout at each other. The food was good but not memorable. We would have enjoyed ourselves much more if not for the long wait. I was a busy night with a very large party taking up several tables so they should not have taken so many reservations.

name: Local
review description: This was our 6th time at Local in the last 5 years. The food has remained consistent, and always one of our favorites. The quality service however, has gone down quite a bit. It's not good when you have to ask for something 5 or 6 times and are lucky that you'll get it. It took over 10 minutes just to get the dessert menu after asking for it. Not sure that we'll be back after this visit. Just doesn't have that same special feel that it used to.

name: The Loft at NYLO Plano at Legacy
review description: First time and what a surprise to find such a funky restaurant in a hotel - reminded me of the W's we've stayed before. Service was a bit slow but the food was great - when it got there. Luckily we weren't in a hurry. A portion of our order never arrived but the tapas we had ordered were sufficient. Despite the minor hiccups, we'll come back again.

name: Lombardi's Cibus
review description: Excellent butternut squash pasta! Fun, well designed restaurant; always attentive service.

name: Lonesome Dove Western Bistro
review description: We ate in the basement, so ambiance was greatly lacking. Not even sure if there was music just 3-4 servers hanging out at the make shift bar. Our table was a 6' x 30" banquet table for six people, so I spent my meal straddling a leg to a table.

name: Lucile's
address: 4700 Camp Bowie Blvd Fort Worth, TX  76107
review description: This is the first time that we have been there that the server was not up to par and we have been there more times than I can count. He assumed a lot of things, such as taking menus before we were finished looking at them. It won't stop us from returning though. Food is always good.

name: Mac's Steak and Seafood Colleyville
review description: Good drinks, the first rib eye was comparable to my shoe but the second one they brought me was ok. The chicken fried steak that my kids had was not up to par with other good steak houses. The calamari was very nice and the service very good however; this is not what I would expect from an good steak house in Texas.

name: Mac's Steaks & Seafood Arlington
review description: Ty was our waiter. He was great! We had Filet Oscar (tonight's special), opting for an additional side of asparagus - no starch; we allowed room for dessert. We were here a few years back but rarely go west to Arlington, normally heading to Plano. I do believe we'll be heading to Arlington more often.

name: Maggiano's - Northpark
review description: Maggiano's is a rally good place to go for a family experience. My only complaint is it is noisy. The food is great , service is excellent. Price is comparative for what you get. I have been there many times and will continue to go back. If there is a problem they quickly resolve it to your satiafaction.

name: Maggiano's - Willow Bend
review description: I always enjoy my experience at the Austin location, so I assumed Plano would be no different. I took my boyfriend here for his birthday and as always the food tasted great and was reasonably priced. It was very busy, so I was glad that I made reservations. My only complaint would be that the service wasn't the best. Our plates were not cleared from the table after our salads, and after we ate our entrees we were waiting almost ten minutes for our waitress to return. It was incredibly busy, but I would have appreciated a more attentive staff. I think I will try this location one more time on a less busy evening.

name: Maguire's North Dallas
review description: Had a fabulous meal with great service by Susie. i had the peppper crusted strip and it was cooked perfect the first time and I am picky abouit that. Wife had the filet with similar result. Our waitress Susie (sp?) was very personable and a joy to have at our table. First time here but definitely not the last.

name: The Mansion Restaurant at Rosewood Mansion on Turtle Creek
review description: My favorite restaurant in Dallas!

name: Marquee Grill & Bar
review description: Service and atmosphere were excellent. We enjoyed the food, the soft shell crab was delicious!

name: Maximo Cocina Mexicana
review description: This is a really good restaurant. The decor is impressive. The food is very good. Kinda surprised there. Were not more patrons there. Granted this in somewhat overpriced Mexican fare but if don't mind $16 enchiladas. Overall experience was good and I would recommend this place to others.

name: Meddlesome Moth
review description: flew in from NYC - took some younger clients - was fantastic all around.

name: Medina Oven & Bar
review description: I am so glad that we found this little gem of a restaurant. The positive reviews were spot on. Great service and outstanding food. And nice cold beer on a very hot Dallas night.

name: The Melting Pot - Arlington TX
address: 4000 Five Points Blvd., Suite 119 Arlington, TX  76018
review description: An absolute delight! Our new go-to venue for a romantic night out!

name: The Mercury
review description: Everything was perfect. Food, staff, table location, noise level- we were able to talk and me heard which was nice for a business dinner.Food could not have been any better. I had the tuna which was heavenly. Prices were just fine for the quality. Some places charge equal and don't deliver- Mercury delivered. Can't wait to go back and try some other menu items.

name: Mercury Chophouse
review description: This is our second visit and have had a great experience both times. The food is outstanding.

name: Mercy Wine Bar
address: 5100 Belt Line Rd Suite #544 Dallas, TX  75254
review description: Great band, great ambience!Food was ok - service needs help. Having a reservation does not mean you have a reservation. They wanted to git 6 adults in a square table for barely 4 even though we made the reservation 5 hours before we got there.

name: Mesa Veracruz Coastal Cuisine
review description: I've been here a few times, but this was my mother's first chance to experience the wonderful food. And she was definitely not disappointed one bit. The food was awesome, as usual. My mother had the snapper, and I had the pork ribs. For dessert, I had the tres leches cake, and my mother had the rice pudding. And she said the pudding was every bit as good as her mother used to make. Excellent job!! Thanks!!

name: Meso Maya
review description: They food was medicore. I would rate Gloria's and MiCocina higher. Service was unattentive even when the crowd vacated. Ordering food at the bar took three requests (chips and salsa.. come on!).

name: Mi Dia From Scratch
review description: Thoroughly enjoyable I will come back

name: Mi Piaci
review description: The food was delicious! Nice atmosphere and wonderful dining experience. Thanks!

name: Michaels Cuisine
review description: I had not eaten at Michaels in a very long time. My husband and I went as a last minute date night and were very pleased with everything. Our server was Emily and she did a great job. Food was exlcellent and prepared perfectly. My steak was as juicy and tender as a Del Frisco's steak. I was very impressed with the quality of our meal and will return soon! The Mojito was fabulous, too.

name: Mignon - Prime Steaks, Seafood and Cocktails
review description: Good selection of filet mignon. OMG the crab mac and cheese is awesome. You must try it!

name: The Mint Dallas
review description: This was my first visit to The Mint and after reading the positive reviews, I was disappointed in my $25 lunch as was my dining companion. Service was fine but our server didn't utter a word to us other than, "Something to drink?" I had the salmon in curry which was fine but for $20, I expected more. Great location and atmosphere/design is excellent. The place was packed. Maybe I just ordered the wrong thing....would give it another try.

name: Momo's Pasta - Addison
review description: The staff went over and above in attending to the five of us. The special touch when plating our friend's birthday dessert was unexpected and added to our celebration!

name: Momo's Pasta Dallas
review description: Great homemade pastas!! Wonderful service!!!

name: Monty's Corner
review description: Excellent job of staying in touch with the customers.

name: Morton's The Steakhouse - Dallas
review description: Morton's is a chain and individual branches vary. This was one of the best, they treated us like royalty and the steak was perfection!

name: Mr G's
address: 2334 North International Parkway Terminal C DFW Airport, TX  75261
review description: This place is right out of a movie, a movie you wish you were in. I can't even explain this place in a way that does it justice. It is comfortable, quit, dark and wonderful. The entire dining room has a mahagony-red glow and feels like you are in a classic gentleman's lounge. The steak had a good pure flavor without over seasoning and was prepared just as I asked. The lobster bisque had a nice complexity to it and very large pieces of lobster mixed in with the caviar garnish. The scotch selection was disappointing but it had a good port selection.

name: NAAN SUSHI JAPANESE RESTAURANT
review description: Great Service, Food, and Happy Hour!!!

name: NAAN Sushi Uptown
review description: Excellent sushi place! Service could have been better but there was a table of 50 there so I am sure that took away from a lot of others. Def will still be back though.

name: Next Wood Fired Bistro & Vino Bar
review description: Our waitress was a pro! She made the experience so pleasant!Food was outstanding! Will definitely be back soon!

name: Nick & Sam's
review description: Thanks for another perfect evening! The champagne you sent to our table was really nice of you!

name: Nicola's Ristorante
address: 5800 Legacy Drive, Suite C1 Plano, TX  75024
review description: Justice is great! Always makes the experience better when he is my server.

name: Nobu Dallas
address: Hotel Crescent Court, 400 Crescent Court Dallas, TX  75201
review description: Very upscale but not worth the price. I am glad I went but probably will not return.

name: NOSH euro bistro
review description: We've been to Nosh twice. One of our favorites in Dallas. Food always very good, -- fresh, well presented. Service -- professional, helpful. Tables not too crowded together, plenty of parking, centrally located. All-round, Nosh a very pleasant dining experience.

name: Nosh Euro Bistro-Plano
review description: We had a great time with our party of six! The service was helpful but not intrusive and the food was fantastic. Every person loved their meal; halibut, short ribs, duck and tenderloin all excellent! The sides are really different and we devoured them.

name: Nusta's Cafe
address: 1730 W. Randol Mill Rd. Suite 146 Arlington, TX  76012
review description: Was everything I expected and more. Wait staff was very friendly and patient, explained all of the dishes to us and even gave us a history on some of the dishes. The food was delicious and the presentation was actually better than the pictures on the website. This was our first experience with Peruvian cuisine and we will definitely be making this a regular stop .

name: Oak
address: 1628 Oak Lawn Avenue, Suite 110 Suite 110 Dallas, TX  75207
review description: Aside from being seated right in front of the door and with the sun setting in my eyes (while there were many other 4 tops available) the dinner went well.

name: Ocean Prime - Dallas
review description: My wife and I celebrated our 13th wedding anniversary at Ocean Prime. We did not know what to expect, as it was recommended by my manager. We found our experience to be delightful. There were rose petals shaped like a heart on the table when we arrived. The staff acknowledged our anniversary over and over again. The wait staff was excellent and the food was wonderful. My wife especially loved her scallops and her shrimp cocktail. Our waiter was knowledgeable and helpful. Everything was 5 star. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a great place to celebrate an anniversary or any other significant event. Very romantic evening. Great job Ocean Prime.

name: Oceanaire Seafood Room - Dallas
review description: Oceanaire is one of the finest restaurants in the metroplex. The service and food are always the highest level. Have never had a bad experience there!

name: The Old Warsaw
review description: Old Warsaw served the best asparagus soup I have ever had; all the food was perfect and so was the service as well.

name: Olenjack's Grille
address: 770 Road to Sixflags Drive St. 100 Arlington, TX  76011
review description: the initial server abandoned my party. creamed corn pureed,good flavor but no resemblance to corn. sandwich bread,1pc. dry no oil or butter,other pc.1/2 tsp.on half of bread,certainly not even a slather..desserts very good otherwise..forgetful..both my companion and I said we would not see a reason to revisit Olenjack

name: One2One Restaurant & Bar
review description: First visit for me; my date occasionally visited the lounge/bar for live entertainment. It was a very enjoyable experience. Service was impeccable; our waiter was quite knowledgeable and my date, who was raised in a fine dining environment, appreciated his suggestions. It was almost empty when we arrived early (6:30) on a Saturday, since we wanted plenty of time to chat and peruse the menu. Quiet enough for one of the chefs to overhear my date's animated and informed comments regarding the menu items and wine list. He surprised us with some delectable morsels that even my unrefined palate was able to appreciate. Menu included 'cordon blue' selections, along with simpler fare (mac n' cheese and delicious pizzas); all reasonably priced!

name: Palm Restaurant - Dallas
review description: Consistently great food. Flawless service. The best lobster I've ever eaten anywhere. The "Gigi" salad is still a must have. Steaks are also top notch. Get yourself to The Palm as soon as possible and enjoy excellence.

name: Palomino - Dallas
review description: Nice place for a business lunch, not too crowded; food is excellent.

name: Pappas Bros. Steakhouse
review description: Can't be beat. Excellent food. Excellent service. If you go, ask for Anthony to be your server!!!!

name: Patrizio
review description: The bellini's are wonderful. My chicken scallopine was very good. We went for an early dinner to celebrate my Mother's 81st birthday and the music was so loud we had to constantly ask them to turn it down, we could barely hear ourselves think. Can't remember our waitress' name but she was very good and adorable.

name: Perry's Steakhouse & Grille - Uptown
review description: My wife and i don't dine out much at lavish restaurants like Perry's, but an associate had given me a gift certificate, so we made a reservation. The food was very good, but it was a little loud in the restaurant. The highlight of our evening was our server, Jorge, who was a pleasure to help us and was great at his role. Thanks Jorge!!

name: Piccolo Mondo
review description: Excellent menu, service and wine list.

name: Place at Perry's
review description: Excellent Food and Service. Salvadore, our waiter was excellent, very attentive & informative

name: Posado's - Plano
review description: It is a Pretty Good Resturant. Kids like it because of the free Ice Cream, however the ice cream machine was not working right. Other than that it was great...

name: The Poule at the Joule
review description: A colleague recommended this spot for a brunch I had with an out of town guest. I've lived in Dallas 8 years and had never been here. It was very relaxing and perfect for Spring and Summer weather. Next time I'm bringing my bathing suit! EXCELLENT service and atmosphere.

name: Primebar
review description: Great beer selection for the beer snob. Food was very good and surprisingly fast for this type of restaurant. Waitress was chatty but not intrusive. Good dinner!

name: Primo's Bar and Grill
review description: It was so loud no one in our group could hear over the noise, other than that it was great.

name: Private Social
review description: This is a great find. Could be better than Abicus.

name: Pyramid Restaurant and Bar
review description: Our server was attentive and respectful. The food was excellent. The steak was cooked exactly to my request and was outstanding topped with bleu cheese. Even the Caesar salad was very good. It was nice and quiet, which was perfect for a business dinner.

name: Rafain Brazilian Steakhouse
review description: This is, by far, my all-time favorite restaurant in all of DFW. The food is amazing. The service is impeccable. The overall atmosphere is warm and inviting and definitely a place for people who thoroughly enjoy eating. Compared to Fogo de Chao and Texas de Brazil, Rafain's is the least pretentious with a waitstaff that makes every dining experience personal and memorable which is why I keep coming back.

name: The Ranch at Las Colinas fka Cadillac Ranch Restaurant
address: 857 West John W Carpenter Freeway Irving, TX  75039
review description: Although we made reservations, our table wasn't particularly special and seemed kind of close to other diners. The appetizers were amazing -- kobe tacos were delicious. It was nice to have Saturday evening feature half price wine bottles and some special drink prices. Our server let us enjoy the evening without rushing us -- also very nice.

name: Randy's Steakhouse
review description: We have dined at Randy's for years. The food is consistently awesome and the service is always attentive without being intrusive. The monthly Wine Dinners are always a treat we try to attend.Our daughter is always welcomed by the staff. We did wait, though, until we felt she was old enough to respect other patrons' dining experience.

name: Rathbun's Blue Plate Kitchen
review description: This has become my favorite restaurant in Dallas. Grandma Minnie's fried chicken is excellent. The starters continue to get better (new favorite is the pimento cheese). Even the bread basket is a delight. I bring everyone here when I have friends come into town.

name: Reata
review description: Such a fantastic way to celebrate our 20th anniversary! Shannon was an awesome waitress and took great interest in making sure we had a great experience. Will be back soon!!

name: Remington's Seafood Grill
review description: Awesome, fresh seafood at a fantastic price.

name: Restaurant AVA
review description: Loved the fresh ingredients on the menu. Also love the weekly changing menu. A great find in Rockwall!

name: Ristorante Nicola
review description: Very good overall, and exemplary service.

name: RJ Mexican Cuisine
address: 1701 N. Market Street In the West End Dallas, TX  75202
review description: Lots of menu options, but not your typical Mexican food. Delicious and our server was awesome! Very friendly, helpful with menu choices.

name: Royal Sixty
review description: Delighted to know about Royal Sixty. Fun atmosphere - good food, but service was slow and uncertain. Almost awkward. They weren't crowded, either.

name: Roy's Plano
review description: Service was excellent; food excellent - very artiscally presented - decor average

name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Ft. Worth
review description: The lady at the front desk,don't recall her name, young lady maybe 50 or so, made my visit there. The waiter forgot my tea, then pretended like it was my fault. There were times that he didn't even check on us for 10 minutes or longer. This was my second visit there, probably my last. the food tasted ok but my stomach did not agree with me.

name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - North Dallas
review description: Always great service and food!!

name: Saint Ann Restaurant and Bar
review description: First-time visitor to Saint Ann before heading to AT&T Performing Arts Center. Great all-around. Based on dinner, it seems like it would be a perfect brunch spot ... need to try that soon!

name: Salum Restaurant
review description: Abraham Salum and his staff know how to create exciting, perfectly executed cuisine. What elevates this restaurant is the service and ambience. It just feels right to eat here. Everything happens precisely when it should, and you are always treated like a valuable customer, someone that the restaurant wants back. The approach works. Salum is a restaurant to which you always want to come back.

name: Sanford House
review description: A great meal while we were in town for a short tip. Picked the location based on recommendations from OpenTable. The food was amazing and the service was more than we could have asked for. All of the comments about the Chocolate dessert are right on and it was a great end to the meal. Both our appetizers and entrees were perfectly cooked and the extras made the meal. If we are ever back in town we will be back for sure.

name: Screen Door
review description: We went for dinner. The food was very good. The service was good albeit slow.

name: Seasons 52 - Plano
address: 7300 Lone Star Drive, Suite C100 Plano, TX  75024
review description: We dined at Seasons52 for our 24th Wedding Anniversary. Our Server Meghan B. was such a doll. She gave us a card for our anniversary, she brought a dessert tree out with a candle on top and took a picture. It was really special and sweet. Our food and service was top notch as usual. This is our favorite restaurant because the food is fresh, good and healthy.

name: SÉR Steak+Spirits
address: Hilton Anatole 2201 Stemmons Freeway Dallas, TX  75207
review description: Nana was a little more 'old school' than we expected, but it seems that's about to change. We actually caught their current set up on it's last night. I actually enjoyed the smartly dressed staff and the lovely place settings. I thought the food was good, though it ranged from just 'good' with a couple of stand outs. We're definitely interested in checking it out after the remodel to see how the experience differs.

name: Sevy's Grill
review description: Wanted a place with great food to have a quiet meal and found it. The duck flautas were amazing. The lamb chops with polenta and cucumber tempanad was perfection. I ended with Tiramisu that was so balanced in flavor it was an excellent ending to the meal. You all enjoy!

name: Sfuzzi
review description: Food was good (not great because one of the pizzas was semi-burnt). We had a large party so we sat at a round booth and felt kind of squeezed in together. Waitress was pleasant and the atmosphere was nice.

name: Sfuzzi - Las Colinas
review description: Food was great and very fresh. Wine list wasn't large but well represented and showed a lot of creativity. Second time back and will go again. Service was very attentive.

name: Shinsei Restaurant
review description: Had heard so much about this place and was excited to finally go. Calamari and spring rolls were really very good. The rest of the meal went down hill from there. No flavor. service was mediocre at best. Really really loud, not the place for a romantic dinner.

name: Silver Fox - Fort Worth
address: 1651 S. University Dr. Fort Worth, TX  76107
review description: ...it will take awhile to get served. We have been here with people waiting outside, packed to the gills inside. Those nights I had quicker bar service and food delivered. What happened here, place was dead.

name: Silver Fox - Grapevine
review description: The steak and Lobster was not as good as it was the pastCouple of times we were there but that wouldn'tStop me from visiting again. Didn't have anythingBut 6oz lobster tails to offer and the outside of theSteak was a little too burnt for my liking. The saladAnd sides were top shelf as the service was too.

name: Silver Fox Steakhouse Frisco
review description: Silver Fox Frisco never lets us down! Steaks were cooked to perfection. Service was excellent. Will be back.

name: Silver Fox Steakhouse Richardson
review description: Not particularly great. We prefer Houston for price and quality

name: Simply Fondue - Ft Worth
address: 111 West 4th Street Suite 15 Ft. Worth, TX  76102
review description: Food was excellent. From cheese fondue to main course finishing with chocolate fondue to die for we had great experience. A timer on cooking the foods might have been helpful but we were completely entertained. Although very pricey we felt as though we received what we paid for.

name: Sissy's Southern Kitchen & Bar
review description: Chili Fried oyster appetizer was delicious. Loved the bucket of fried chicken. I enjoy the outfits of the employees. Only flaw was drinks from the bar arrived after we had finished our appetizer.

name: The Southfork Hotel
review description: Mother's Day brunch. Not nearly worth the price of admission. Added gratuity to the price. Service was terrible. Drinks empty for long periods. Brought kids cups with no lids. I ended up going to the server station multiple times to refill my tables drinks. I would have left little or no gratuity for a buffet meal where drink service was bad.

name: The Standard Pour
review description: Really enjoyed my cocktails. Was happy to see our reservation was honored because it was very busy. I think its more of a bar with food than a restaurant. To be considered a restaurant, another page of menu selections for food should be offered. I will definitely come back - for snacks and drinks.

name: Steel
review description: A little pricey but well worth it. The best sushi and sashimi I've ever had inland

name: Stephan Pyles
review description: What an excellent dinner. I was looking for a last minute reservation for our 25th wedding anniversary. We had the 6 course tasting meal with wine service. We LOVED it, and will come back.

name: Steve Fields Steak and Lobster Lounge
review description: Steve Fields is my favorite restaurant in Plano! I love the food! I love the bar! I love Steve Fields, himself! He is soooooooooo personable, sweet, kind and remembered us! I love him! Everyone should frequent this fabulous restaurant!! We even got a complimentary piece of chocolate cake presented by Steve!, love this place!

name: Sushi Zushi - Dallas
review description: Great sushi.. didn't feel rushed at all but service was quick and attentive

name: Sushi Zushi of Southlake
address: 1420 E. Southlake Blvd Suite 168 Southlake, TX  76092
review description: Very broad menu. Good sushi. Overall a great experience.

name: Suze Restaurant
review description: Neighborhood gem for us. Location next to Albertsons not great but, once inside, delicious food and service. Packed house on a Tuesday night which says a lot. Brussel sprouts salad was tasty. Soft shell crab not really up to par with rest of dinner. Sticky toffee pudding was so divine, we nearly licked the plate.

name: T/X Restaurant
review description: The food is inovative and well prepared, service is very attentive. The curtains hanging throughout give the illusion of intimacy.

name: Technique at Le Cordon Bleu - Dallas
address: 11830 Webb chapel Road Suite 1200 Dallas, TX  75234
review description: Techniques is a great experience. We had great service from a student. It is a great value, as you get gourmet items, an appetizer, entree and dessert for $16.

name: TEI-AN
review description: fantastic all around. 2 Michelan stars and if there was a market for 3 in Dallas they would get it

name: Texas
review description: Excellent service by Daniel, great food, great experience. Last trip to Texas was marginal service for an upscale restaurant but glad we tried it again. Fillets melt in your mouth, great sides and burnt corn was done to perfection....gotta try it!

name: Texas Spice
review description: We went to Texas Spice for dinner, on the 4th of July. This happened to be one of the few restaurants that was open that day. We tried the dinner buffet. The selections and food was good, nothing out of the ordinary. We ordered a couple of drinks and they turned out fine. The restaurant changes an automatic 18% gratuity on the buffet, even for parties with 2 adults and a 4 year old. For that level for gratuity the service is definitely lacking - it was slow and erroneous. We were initialy charged for our 4 year old, after bringing that to the attention of the waiter he took it off, but still somehow managed to keep the original gratuity amount on it. So, another round of corrections, before we could pay and be out of there.

name: Tillman's Roadhouse - Dallas
review description: It was our first visit and we will definitely return to enjoy the food.

name: Tillman's Roadhouse - Fort Worth
review description: we had 8:30pm reservations on a Saturday night and got seated right away; however it was about 15 minutes before our waiter came to the table to get our drink order. It was very noisy and hard to carry on a conversation.

name: Tokyo Cafe
review description: This is your place if you want consistently great sushi and variety. Tok fries are a must. Dan Dan was great. Sushi was superb. Fresh and pleasantly presented.

name: Townhouse-Dallas
review description: Beautiful space. That is the positive.My wife and I decided Check out this new restaurant and had less than a stellar experience, in fact, we left shortly after our arrival. Allow me to explain, upon arriving the hostess smiled and greeted us but then never asked if we would be dining, if we had a reservation or how many would be in our party. After informing her of our reservation we were quickly seated in a booth on the far wall. The restaurant was empty except a few tables. The busser arrived quickly and filled our water glass but then we waited a while for our server to greet us. When he finally did he offered and took our drink order. We never saw him again. After waiting a long time we decided we had been forgot and decided to go.

name: Trevi's Restaurant - Omni Mandalay
address: 221 Las Colinas Blvd East Irving, TX  75039
review description: My 16-year old twin daughters and I were guests at the Omni Mandalay and dined at Trevi's on Friday, July 6th at 9:30 a.m. for breakfast and what a treat! We ordered their fabulous French Toast w/carmelized bananas which was to die for and the pancake breakfast which included eggs, bacon and hash browns. The fresh fruit tray was exceptional as well. The service far exceeded my expectations. We definitely had to return the next day for breakfast which included their buffet offering made to order omelet's! We will return soon.

name: Triniti at Tower Club
review description: Food and service were outstanding!!! Our waiter was awesome. The steak Diane was great. We had a georgeous view right next to the window.

name: TruFire Kitchen & Bar
review description: Great meal. Very helpful service. Interesting menu options.

name: Truluck's Seafood, Steak and Crab House - Addison
review description: Truluck's is always good for a great meal. The power went out due to some wind and rain storms. We had to wait 30 mins for our check but other than that our meal was great. I had the Halibut, added the lump crab with tomatoes and basil which was just divine. My husband enjoyed his filet mignon.

name: Truluck's Seafood, Steak and Crab House - Dallas Uptown
review description: Fabulous as usual! Our waiter was soooooooooooo great, so efficient, and just knew what we liked! Food was great!

name: Truluck's Seafood, Steak and Crab House - Southlake
review description: LOVED the sea bass simply grilled. Desserts are weak, but the coffee is fresh. Wine list is short but strong.

name: Via Real
review description: We had a fantastic time here celebrating my Mom's birthday. The service was outstanding, as was the food. It's upscale Mexican so depending on what you order it's not inexpensive, but it is well worth it. They treated us so well and helped so celebrate our Mom's birthday with a photograph in a card and a piece of cake with a candle in it.

name: Victory Tavern
review description: Great spot for pre-concert or game drinks, but skip the food and do dinner elsewhere! Limited menu wasn't the best. I had a burger and truffle fries, both were ok, but my hubby's chicken dish left much to be desired! Location is key...just a few steps from the AA Center...

name: Villa O
review description: Made a reservation but still had to wait 20 minutes for a table. Got a really bad table next to a door that kept swinging open and hitting my chair. Then waited 10 minutes at the table for service before flagging someone down. In their defense it was super busy, but I guess they should be prepared for that. We were there for brunch, loved the bottomless bellinis - gotta hand it to the waiter that eventually served us he kept our drinks full the whole time. I had the organic omlett which was good. Asked for ketchup but never got any :(

name: Vineyard Steakhouse & Skybar
review description: Overall: Just a great restaurant to relax and have incredible food...

name: The Wild Mushroom
review description: Great prime rib. Certainly glad we found this place! Can't wait to go back.

name: Wild Salsa
review description: We were expecting a great new restaurant that we would love, but were sadly disappointed. To start with our waiter was not too attentive to our needs. The food we ordered also was just average, nothing special. We ordered tacos and quesadillas. The tacos were not half as good as velvet taco in Dallas. The quesadilla were very different, tasted like they were Italian quesadilla.Now the good: the guacomole! Then again it was $10. I don't know if it's worth it, when other places have great guacomole for half the price. This ends the good about Wild Salsa.I'm sure this place is great for late night drinks and appetizers!

name: Wildcatter Steakhouse
review description: Food was perfect, along with what is probably the best scenic views in all of North Texas! Truly a special place.

name: Winewood
review description: The service was awful. The waitress rarely came by and the food took forever. We easily sat 20 minutes after completing the appetizer, which we just picked at, no waitress, no food, nothing to drink water or otherwise. I had the Parmesan encrusted tuna, while reasonably priced it was the smallest skinniest pathetic piece of tuna I had ever seen. Tuna us normally served as a thick piece seared on each side, sliced thin and served. At Winewood, the piece of tuna was seared on one side (because it was sooooo thin), left whole and it was as thick as a piece of tune that had been sliced. While moderately priced, this was extremely disappointing.

name: Woodfire Kirby's - Dallas
review description: Food was good- service was bad.

name: Woodshed Smokehouse
review description: The food was amazing! We had the Beef Shin. The waiter said it would feed 4-6, 6-8 would be more like it! We took home left overs! It was almost better 2nd time around!! The customer service was good too! They had a band that started early which we really liked. Most places start late, about the time we leave. This evening the band was really good. It gave the place a nice vibe.

name: Y.O. Ranch Steakhouse
review description: The 'colossal shrimp' were bigger than average, but certainly not 'collosal'. The food was good, although the portions were a bit small for a steakhouse IMO. I had steak and it was very good, but to spend $30+ for a steak of medium size, I would think I would at least get a side item and not have to spend $7-8 more for one. The salads were also smaller than I remember when I came here a few years ago, but all in all the food and service were very good.

name: Yao Fuzi Cuisine
address: 4757 West Park Boulevard Suite 108 Plano, TX  75093
review description: It's always a delight to dine at Yao Fuzi. The food is excellent and the staff friendly. Chris competently manages the scene with warm professionalism and a sensitivity to guests wants and needs.

name: Yellow Rose Steak and Chop House
address: 890 Parker Square Dr Flower Mound, TX  75028
review description: Overall I felt this was a "Good" experience, however the food was a little less than I expected. I ordered the Ribeye and while this cut should be expected with moderate marbling, this particular cut I received had extreme amounts (25% waste). Clearly the chef should have trimmed this cut prior to cooking.

name: Ziziki's -  Plano
review description: I usually go to Ziziki's for lunch. I have a favorite dish that I usually get. When I went for dinner I did not find my favorite dish on the menu. They were very nice and allowed me to get my dish for dinner. I love this place!

name: Ziziki's - N. Dallas
review description: This is a favorite neighborhood restaurant. The ambiance is that of a 5 star restaurant. The lighting is perfect and there is always a nice bustle to the place. The wait staff has been there a long time and are experienced servers. They know when to approach and when not. Service has always been top notch. The food is wonderful and always consistent. I have never been disappointed.

name: Ziziki's - Travis Walk
review description: Always a pleasure to fine at Ziziki's. It has that perfect combination of wonderful Greek specialties, lovely intimate atmosphere, and smiling service. 'A keeper'.

name: Ziziki's Taverna
review description: We enjoy Ziziki's and definitely recommend it!

name: Zodiac at Neiman Marcus – Downtown Dallas
review description: I brought a friend and my sisters from out of town. Everyone loved it. The service was classic and the food was delicious. The room is very comfortable and beautiful.
